## Cronex as a Client

```lua
require("cronex").setup({
    extractor = {
        cron_from_line = require("cronex.cron_from_line").cron_from_line,
        extract = require("cronex.extract").extract,
    },
    explainer = {
        cmd = "cronstrue",
        args = {}
    },
    format = function(s)
        return s
    end
})

```
